Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) for i=0,3 do reflex_clearLights(0,i) end end

Actor.UpdateCommand: %function(self) if GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(PLAYER_1) then self:SetFromTrail(GAMESTATE:GetCurrentTrail(PLAYER_1)) else self:SetFromSteps(GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(PLAYER_1)) end P1Difficulty = self:GetChild('Difficulty'):GetText() end

Layer.SetCommand:
%function(self)
local pn = 0
if GAMESTATE:IsPlayerEnabled(pn) then
local NotesHitScore = 0; local NotesPossibleScore = 0; local PlayerPercentageUKSRT = 0; local Selection = GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSteps(pn);
NotesPossibleScore = STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(pn):GetPossibleDancePoints() NotesHitScore = (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_MARVELOUS) * 5 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_PERFECT) * 4 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_GREAT) * 2 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_BOO) * -2 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_MISS) * -4 ) + (GetHoldScore(pn, HNS_OK) * 5 ) + (GetTapScore(pn, TNS_HITMINE) * -8 )
PlayerPercentageUKSRT = NotesHitScore/NotesPossibleScore *100
self:settext( string.format('%.2f',PlayerPercentageUKSRT)..'%' )
end
end
